builtinMetrics.name: answer_correctness
builtinMetrics.description: Evaluates the factual accuracy of model responses compared to ground truth answers.

builtinMetrics.name: answer_similarity
builtinMetrics.description: Measures semantic similarity between model output and reference answer.

builtinMetrics.name: answer_relevancy
builtinMetrics.description: Measures how relevant the generated answer is to the user's question.

builtinMetrics.name: context_precision
builtinMetrics.description: Measures the proportion of relevant contexts among the retrieved contexts.

builtinMetrics.name: context_recall
builtinMetrics.description: Measures the proportion of relevant contexts that were successfully retrieved.

builtinMetrics.name: faithfulness
builtinMetrics.description: Evaluates whether the generated answer is faithful to the retrieved context.
